page.title: 11WARDMILL FARM SHOP
page.content: WARDMILL FARM SHOP IS SITUATED APPROXIMATELY{2km}NORTH OF FORFAR ON THE{A-94}.IT SELLS VEGETABLES OF ALL SORTS, EVEN FROM FOREIGN COUNTRIES, SUCH AS DUTCH TOMATOES AND EGYPTIAN POTATOES. ON SALE ALSO ARE PIES, BUT THE MAIN FOOD IS BUTCHER MEAT.THE OWNER FATTENS UP THE ANIMALS HIMSELF AND HAS THEM SLAUGHTERED IN FORFAR AND BRECHIN. THE FARM SHOP IS OPEN{7}DAYS A WEEK FROM{8am-5pm}BUT THESE HOURS CAN VARY. THE SHOP HAS A STAFF OF SIX AND THE NUMBER OF CUSTOMERS VARIES DAILY.{ WHILE THE FORFAR BY-PASS IS BEING BUILT THE OWNER BELIEVES THERE WILL BE A FALL IN TRADE BUT AFTER ITS COMPLETION HE THINKS TRADE WILL IMPROVE. THE FARM SHOP WAS OPENED ON THE{ {29th OF MARCH, 1982}AND WAS ATTENDED BY OVER SEVENTY PEOPLE.
